<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Additional information about basic blocks where the current variable is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// live. Such a block will look like one of these templates:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///  1 |   o---x   | Internal to block. Variable is only live in this block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///  2 |---x       | Live-in, kill.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///  3 |       o---| Def, live-out.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///  4 |---x   o---| Live-in, kill, def, live-out. Counted by NumGapBlocks.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///  5 |---o---o---| Live-through with uses or defs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///  6 |-----------| Live-through without uses. Counted by NumThroughBlocks.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Two BlockInfo entries are created for template 4 One for the live-in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// segment, and one for the live-out segment. These entries look as if the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// block were split in the middle where the live range isn&#39;t live.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Live-through blocks without any uses don&#39;t get BlockInfo entries. They</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// are simply listed in ThroughBlocks instead.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/splitanalysis/blockinfo"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/splitanalysis/blockinfo">BlockInfo</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/splitanalysis/blockinfo/#a6d25ab70a5fda1310dad85ddb8ecaa22"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/splitanalysis/blockinfo/#a6d25ab70a5fda1310dad85ddb8ecaa22">MBB</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/splitanalysis/blockinfo/#afc1d576ff2321f8f3a604808be1b6f5b"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slotindex">SlotIndex</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/splitanalysis/blockinfo/#afc1d576ff2321f8f3a604808be1b6f5b">FirstInstr</a>; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///&lt; First instr accessing current reg.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/splitanalysis/blockinfo/#abaae5e7f00635019260dd4d2506e2b58"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slotindex">SlotIndex</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/splitanalysis/blockinfo/#abaae5e7f00635019260dd4d2506e2b58">LastInstr</a>;  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///&lt; Last instr accessing current reg.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/splitanalysis/blockinfo/#a2ef80e68e8ebc6f8e778d811cc48f67f"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slotindex">SlotIndex</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/splitanalysis/blockinfo/#a2ef80e68e8ebc6f8e778d811cc48f67f">FirstDef</a>;   </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///&lt; First non-phi valno-&gt;def, or SlotIndex().</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/splitanalysis/blockinfo/#a4c7b9375634dd9b55f130ae4c428475c"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/splitanalysis/blockinfo/#a4c7b9375634dd9b55f130ae4c428475c">LiveIn</a>;          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///&lt; Current reg is live in.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/splitanalysis/blockinfo/#a42e9b38c4f9bc0c0aca6f0c8c5cd1f80"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/splitanalysis/blockinfo/#a42e9b38c4f9bc0c0aca6f0c8c5cd1f80">LiveOut</a>;         </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///&lt; Current reg is live out.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// isOneInstr - Returns true when this BlockInfo describes a single</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// SplitEditor - Edit machine code and LiveIntervals for live range</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// splitting.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// - Create a SplitEditor from a SplitAnalysis.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// - Start a new live interval with openIntv.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// - Mark the places where the new interval is entered using enterIntv&#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// - Mark the ranges where the new interval is used with useIntv&#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// - Mark the places where the interval is exited with exitIntv&#42;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// - Finish the current interval with closeIntv and repeat from 2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// - Rewrite instructions with finish().</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spliteditor"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/compiler-h/#a662e21bcce5c9c71b6cc511fa04f900f">LLVM&#95;LIBRARY&#95;VISIBILITY</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spliteditor/#a4a6b060244db6c0da73f9ba4ec523559">SplitEditor</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/splitanalysis">SplitAnalysis</a> &amp;SA;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveintervals">LiveIntervals</a> &amp;LIS;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/virtregmap">VirtRegMap</a> &amp;VRM;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineregisterinfo">MachineRegisterInfo</a> &amp;MRI;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinedominatortree">MachineDominatorTree</a> &amp;MDT;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetinstrinfo">TargetInstrInfo</a> &amp;TII;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterinfo">TargetRegisterInfo</a> &amp;TRI;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineblockfrequencyinfo">MachineBlockFrequencyInfo</a> &amp;MBFI;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/virtregauxinfo">VirtRegAuxInfo</a> &amp;VRAI;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// ComplementSpillMode - Select how the complement live range should be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// created.  SplitEditor automatically creates interval 0 to contain</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// anything that isn&#39;t added to another interval.  This complement interval</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// can get quite complicated, and it can sometimes be an advantage to allow</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// it to overlap the other intervals.  If it is going to spill anyway, no</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// registers are wasted by keeping a value in two places at the same time.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spliteditor/#ad485b75a455867847a669a3f942cbcb7"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">enum</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spliteditor/#ad485b75a455867847a669a3f942cbcb7">ComplementSpillMode</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// SM&#95;Partition(Default) - Try to create the complement interval so it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// doesn&#39;t overlap any other intervals, and the original interval is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// partitioned.  This may require a large number of back copies and extra</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// PHI-defs.  Only segments marked with overlapIntv will be overlapping.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spliteditor/#ad485b75a455867847a669a3f942cbcb7a5cd5c6b9f5402366a8e7a28a55925720"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spliteditor/#ad485b75a455867847a669a3f942cbcb7a5cd5c6b9f5402366a8e7a28a55925720">SM&#95;Partition</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// SM&#95;Size - Overlap intervals to minimize the number of inserted COPY</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// instructions.  Copies to the complement interval are hoisted to their</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// common dominator, so only one COPY is required per value in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// complement interval.  This also means that no extra PHI-defs need to be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// inserted in the complement interval.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spliteditor/#ad485b75a455867847a669a3f942cbcb7ade36d2a249a7f767c968e8667190bc11"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spliteditor/#ad485b75a455867847a669a3f942cbcb7ade36d2a249a7f767c968e8667190bc11">SM&#95;Size</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// SM&#95;Speed - Overlap intervals to minimize the expected execution</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// frequency of the inserted copies.  This is very similar to SM&#95;Size, but</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// the complement interval may get some extra PHI-defs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spliteditor/#ad485b75a455867847a669a3f942cbcb7a7bfb05c8742572ff98fd4f226bb0aede"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spliteditor/#ad485b75a455867847a669a3f942cbcb7a7bfb05c8742572ff98fd4f226bb0aede">SM&#95;Speed</a></span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">private</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Edit - The current parent register and new intervals created.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liverangeedit">LiveRangeEdit</a> &#42;Edit = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Index into Edit of the currently open interval.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The index 0 is used for the complement, so the first interval started by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// openIntv will be 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> OpenIdx = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The current spill mode, selected by reset().</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ComplementSpillMode SpillMode = SM&#95;Partition;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight">RegAssignMap = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/intervalmap">IntervalMap&lt;SlotIndex, unsigned&gt;</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Allocator for the interval map. This will eventually be shared with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// SlotIndexes and LiveIntervals.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><span class="doxyHighlight">  RegAssignMap::Allocator <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/regallocbasic-cpp/#ad5d00e1d77644d95847b9bf8da12b759">Allocator</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// RegAssign - Map of the assigned register indexes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Edit.get(RegAssign.lookup(Idx)) is the register that should be live at</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Idx.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><span class="doxyHighlight">  RegAssignMap RegAssign;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight">ValueForcePair = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pointerintpair">PointerIntPair&lt;VNInfo &#42;, 1&gt;</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/valuemap">ValueMap</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;std::pair&lt;unsigned, unsigned&gt;</a>, ValueForcePair&gt;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Values - keep track of the mapping from parent values to values in the new</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// intervals. Given a pair (RegIdx, ParentVNI-&gt;id), Values contains:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// 1 No entry - the value is not mapped to Edit.get(RegIdx).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// 2 (Null, false) - the value is mapped to multiple values in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///    Edit.get(RegIdx).  Each value is represented by a minimal live range at</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///    its def.  The full live range can be inferred exactly from the range</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///    of RegIdx in RegAssign.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// 3 (Null, true).  As above, but the ranges in RegAssign are too large, and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///    the live range must be recomputed using ::extend().</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// 4 (VNI, false) The value is mapped to a single new value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///    The new value has no live ranges anywhere.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/valuemap">ValueMap</a> Values;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// LICalc - Cache for computing live ranges and SSA update.  Each instance</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// can only handle non-overlapping live ranges, so use a separate</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// LiveIntervalCalc instance for the complement interval when in spill mode.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Return the end of the live range.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slotindex">SlotIndex</a> leaveIntvAtTop(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// overlapIntv - Indicate that all instructions in range should use the open</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// interval if End does not have tied-def usage of the register and in this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// case complement interval is used. Let the complement interval be live.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This doubles the register pressure, but is sometimes required to deal with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// register uses after the last valid split point.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The Start index should be a return value from a leaveIntv&#42; call, and End</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// should be in the same basic block. The parent interval must have the same</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// value across the range.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="507"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="508"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> overlapIntv(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slotindex">SlotIndex</a> Start, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slotindex">SlotIndex</a> End);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="509"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="510"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// finish - after all the new live ranges have been created, compute the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="511"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// remaining live range, and rewrite instructions to use the new registers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="512"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// @param LRMap When not null, this vector will map each live range in Edit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="513"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///              back to the indices returned by openIntv.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="514"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///              There may be extra indices created by dead code elimination.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> finish(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;unsigned&gt;</a> &#42;LRMap = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="517"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// dump - print the current interval mapping to dbgs().</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a03503773241005f01b090b9862aad304">dump</a>() </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ===--- High level methods ---===</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="522"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// splitSingleBlock - Split CurLI into a separate live interval around the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// uses in a single block. This is intended to be used as part of a larger</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// split, and doesn&#39;t call finish().</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> splitSingleBlock(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/splitanalysis/blockinfo">SplitAnalysis::BlockInfo</a> &amp;BI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// splitLiveThroughBlock - Split CurLI in the given block such that it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// enters the block in IntvIn and leaves it in IntvOut. There may be uses in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the block, but they will be ignored when placing split points.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// @param MBBNum      Block number.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// @param IntvIn      Interval index entering the block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// @param LeaveBefore When set, leave IntvIn before this point.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// @param IntvOut     Interval index leaving the block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// @param EnterAfter  When set, enter IntvOut after this point.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> splitLiveThroughBlock(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MBBNum,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IntvIn, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slotindex">SlotIndex</a> LeaveBefore,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="538"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IntvOut, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slotindex">SlotIndex</a> EnterAfter);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="539"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="540"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// splitRegInBlock - Split CurLI in the given block such that it enters the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="541"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// block in IntvIn and leaves it on the stack (or not at all). Split points</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="542"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// are placed in a way that avoids putting uses in the stack interval. This</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="543"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// may require creating a local interval when there is interference.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="544"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="545"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// @param BI          Block descriptor.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="546"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// @param IntvIn      Interval index entering the block. Not 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="547"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// @param LeaveBefore When set, leave IntvIn before this point.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="548"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> splitRegInBlock(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/splitanalysis/blockinfo">SplitAnalysis::BlockInfo</a> &amp;BI,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="549"><span class="doxyHighlight">                       </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IntvIn, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slotindex">SlotIndex</a> LeaveBefore);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="550"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="551"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// splitRegOutBlock - Split CurLI in the given block such that it enters the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="552"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// block on the stack (or isn&#39;t live-in at all) and leaves it in IntvOut.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="553"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Split points are placed to avoid interference and such that the uses are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="554"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// not in the stack interval. This may require creating a local interval</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="555"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// when there is interference.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="556"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="557"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// @param BI          Block descriptor.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="558"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// @param IntvOut     Interval index leaving the block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// @param EnterAfter  When set, enter IntvOut after this point.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="560"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> splitRegOutBlock(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/splitanalysis/blockinfo">SplitAnalysis::BlockInfo</a> &amp;BI,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="561"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IntvOut, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slotindex">SlotIndex</a> EnterAfter);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="562"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
